columns.name: replication_instance_identifier
columns.description: The identifier of the replication instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_instance_class
columns.description: The compute and memory capacity of the replication instance as defined for the specified replication instance class.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: The engine version number of the replication instance.

columns.name: publicly_accessible
columns.description: Specifies the accessibility options for the replication instance.

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: The amount of storage (in gigabytes) that is allocated for the replication instance.

columns.name: auto_minor_version_upgrade
columns.description: Boolean value indicating if minor version upgrades will be automatically applied to the instance.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone for the instance.

columns.name: dns_name_servers
columns.description: The DNS name servers supported for the replication instance to access your on-premise source or target database.

columns.name: free_until
columns.description: The expiration date of the free replication instance that is part of the Free DMS program.

columns.name: instance_create_time
columns.description: The time the replication instance was created.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: An AWS KMS key identifier that is used to encrypt the data on the replication instance.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: Specifies whether the replication instance is a Multi-AZ deployment.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: The maintenance window times for the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_instance_private_ip_address
columns.description: The private IP address of the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_instance_public_ip_address
columns.description: The public IP address of the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_instance_status
columns.description: The status of the replication instance.

columns.name: secondary_availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone of the standby replication instance in a Multi-AZ deployment.

columns.name: pending_modified_values
columns.description: The pending modification values.

columns.name: replication_instance_private_ip_addresses
columns.description: One or more private IP addresses for the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_instance_public_ip_addresses
columns.description: One or more public IP addresses for the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_subnet_group
columns.description: The subnet group for the replication instance.

columns.name: vpc_security_groups
columns.description: The VPC security group for the instance.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags currently associated with the replication instance.
